医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新研究显示年龄、性别、种族对于预测老年人的死亡风险至关重要研究发现，LS7 和 LE8 评分在预测全因死亡率和心血管死亡率方面对美国整体人口具有相似的功效。然而，PCE 评分更能预测 40 至 79 岁人群的死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240505/New-study-shows-age-sex-race-crucial-for-predicting-mortality-risks-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240505/New-study-shows-age-sex-race-crucial-for-predicting-mortality-risks-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=082a616d-4dfa-40fe-984a-5f047c5fef7e Sun, 05 May 2024 20:40:00 -0400 New study shows age, sex, race crucial for predicting mortality risks in older adults
探索 COVID-19 对身体成分的长期影响COVID-19 也可能影响身体成分，即使是那些没有感染的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240505/Long-term-impact-of-COVID-19-on-body-composition-explored.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240505/Long-term-impact-of-COVID-19-on-body-composition-explored.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd95deac-9364-4129-ab3d-817922101900 Sun, 05 May 2024 19:45:00 -0400 Long-term impact of COVID-19 on body composition explored
高脂肪饮食加速大鼠衰老相关记忆丧失研究发现，高脂肪饮食会加剧大鼠与年龄相关的认知能力下降，即使将小胶质细胞从方程中去除，这表明其他途径可能发挥作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240505/High-fat-diet-accelerates-aging-lated-memory-loss-in-rats.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240505/High-fat-diet-accelerates-aging-lated-memory-loss-in-rats.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75e221cd-46df-4b9c-ab33-4060b60b586a Sun, 05 May 2024 19:35:00 -0400 High-fat diet accelerates aging-related memory loss in rats
滑板车伤害上升：牙医警告电动滑板车事故呈上升趋势研究发现，从 2020 年到 2022 年，英国与电动滑板车相关的牙齿伤害显着增加，其中无端跌倒是最常见的原因，许多伤害与缺乏头盔和中毒有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240505/Rising-scooter-injuries-Dentists-warn-of-having-trend-in-e-scooter-accidents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240505/Rising-scooter-injuries-Dentists-warn-of-having-trend-in-e-scooter-accidents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f30072ba-2573-4bb6-bec0-fab6860689b4 Sun, 05 May 2024 19:26:00 -0400 Rising scooter injuries: Dentists warn of growing trend in e-scooter accidents
肠道微生物组中的天然化合物显示出治疗炎症的希望多伦多大学的研究人员发现肠道中天然存在的化合物可以用来减少炎症和其他消化问题症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/Natural-compounds-in-gut-microbiome-show-promise-for-inflammation-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/Natural-compounds-in-gut-microbiome-show-promise-for-inflammation-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb66aa35-9baf-4389-a105-b0130191c3ba Fri, 03 May 2024 23:47:00 -0400 Natural compounds in gut microbiome show promise for inflammation treatment
新数据揭示了 TAVR 患者经皮冠状动脉介入治疗的最佳时机新数据显示，对于稳定性冠状动脉疾病（CAD）患者，在经导管主动脉瓣置换术（TAVR）之前、期间或之后可以安全地进行经皮冠状动脉介入治疗（PCI）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/New-data-reveals-optimal-timing-for-perderma-coronary-intervention-in-TAVR-患者.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/New-data-reveals-optimal-timing-for-perderma-coronary-intervention-in-TAVR-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7ad6d84-7cb3-46d1-a6bd-43a9cf36f1b5 Fri, 03 May 2024 23:40:15 -0400 New data reveals optimal timing for percutaneous coronary intervention in TAVR patients
MHFA 对惩教人员的培训可能会增强监狱中的心理健康支持罗格斯健康中心的研究人员表示，对惩教人员进行成人心理健康急救 (MHFA) 培训（国家心理健康委员会推出的一项为期 7.5 小时的全国教育计划），可能有助于为他们提供必要的技能，以有效识别心理健康急救的体征和症状。精神困扰并为面临心理健康危机的被监禁者提供支持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/MHFA-training-for- Correctional-officers-may-boost-mental-health-support-in-prisons.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/MHFA-training-for- Correctional-officers-may-boost-mental-health-support-in-prisons.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3f4172a-0391-4e11-8e14-90b1039f9694 Fri, 03 May 2024 23:35:00 -0400 MHFA training for correctional officers may boost mental health support in prisons
针对 AML 和其他血癌的新型疫苗方法急性髓性白血病 (AML) 是一种在骨骼的软骨髓中形成的血癌，通常会攻击原本构成人体免疫防御系统关键组成部分的细胞——白细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/Novel-vaccine-approach-targets-AML-and-other-blood-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/Novel-vaccine-approach-targets-AML-and-other-blood-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8b7a006-ceba-4572-b281-5613961b10de Fri, 03 May 2024 23:28:00 -0400 Novel vaccine approach targets AML and other blood cancers
探索西班牙/拉丁美洲患者癌症的分子景观2024 年 4 月 22 日，《Oncoscience》（第 11 卷）发表了一篇新的社论论文，题为“探索西班牙/拉丁美洲癌症患者的致癌驱动分子改变：呼吁增强分子理解”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/Exploring-molecular-landscapes-of-cancer-in-HispanicLatin-American- Patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/Exploring-molecular-landscapes-of-cancer-in-HispanicLatin-American-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22998a96-3a89-49d8-a518-36821a231e47 Fri, 03 May 2024 23:20:00 -0400 Exploring molecular landscapes of cancer in Hispanic/Latin American patients
新颖的制造方法创建用于组织再生的对齐纳米纤维水凝胶莱斯大学和休斯顿大学的化学家和生物工程师团队在创造一种可用于在人体外生长生物组织的生物材料的工作中取得了一个重要的里程碑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/Novel-fabrication-method-creates-aligned-nanofibre-Hydrogels-for-tissue-regenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240503/Novel-fabrication-method-creates-aligned-nanofibre-Hydrogels-for-tissue-regenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a29480a-88f8-4748-af47-69e3386928d4 Fri, 03 May 2024 23:12:02 -0400 Novel fabrication method creates aligned nanofiber hydrogels for tissue regeneration
